txt.en: Search for Oganuin within Sant Lhoer
You should explore Sant Lhoer and look for the sorceress Oganuin.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Forba' skill to call Forba to your side in Sant Lhoer.</rgb>

Sant Lhoer, known as the Poison Gardens of Carn Dûm, is a dank place teeming with deadly plants, trees, and flowers, the likes of which have rarely or never been seen before in Middle-earth. Beyond the foetid, beryl-green waters which flow through Sant Lhoer, rise immense glass structures, including Bâr Heledh, the Glass House. It is here that the sorceress Oganuin plies her craft, experimenting upon creatures, plants, and people alike. To what end, and for what purpose? One can only assume the darkest of designs.
You have defeated Tarkka-oka and Cráthair

You stand before Bâr Heledh, the Glass House of Carn Dûm. Within its metal and glass walls the sorceress Oganuin practices her fell crafts, creating abominations and twisting living things towards unnatural ends.

You should defeat Oganuin.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Forba' skill to call Forba to your side in Sant Lhoer.</rgb>

Within Sant Lhoer you have come across an Angmarim sorcerer, Cráthair, and his companion, the Jorthkyn Tarkka-oka. The latter is like nothing you have ever seen before. This must be one of Oganuin's foul experiments! You should defeat the pair.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Forba' skill to call Forba to your side in Sant Lhoer.</rgb>

When you defeated Tarkka-oka and Cráthair, you acquired the key to the North Gate.

You should unlock the North Gate and continue on.

<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You can use the 'Call Forba' skill to call Forba to your side in Sant Lhoer.</rgb>
Pick up the summoning horn and call Forba to your side
You have entered the Poison Gardens of Carn Dûm, Sant Lhoer.\n\nYou should use the nearby summoning horn to call an ally, Forba, to your side.
Sant Lhoer, the Poison Gardens -- Solo/Duo
